title: PoolPal Dashboard
description: This company specializes in the maintenance and monitoring of commercial and institutional swimming pools. This project involved the development of a comprehensive system, encompassing both administrative and customer-facing functionalities. Each section underwent independent design and implementation, ensuring a tailored and optimized user experience for both internal staff and external clients.

title: The Life Guard Dashboard
description: This admin panel is for managing lifeguard recruitment and contracts and financial management of payments. Employee management, appointment management, payment management are parts of this program.

title: ChatBot PoolPal
description: This admin panel is for managing lifeguard recruitment and contracts and financial management of payments. Employee management, appointment management, payment management are parts of this program.

title: Peekage Admin Panel
description: With Peekage, marketers can target a specific audience, have a two-way communication channel with consumers, and re-target samplers based on their behavior. Creating a panel for marketing users and for defining advertising campaigns and displaying the amount of initial feedback was one of the features of the panel.

Creating a panel for marketing users and for defining advertising campaigns and displaying the amount of initial feedback was one of the features of the panel.

title: Aram Hospital
description: Aram Hospital, with its specialized clinics, needed to manage all of its equipment. Using this program, it was possible to manage and maintain the hospital's equipment. This program made it possible to be aware of periodic equipment services and reduce repair costs.

title: Caring Admin Panel
description: With Peekage, marketers can target a specific audience, have a two-way communication channel with consumers, and re-target samplers based on their behavior. Creating a panel for marketing users and for defining advertising campaigns and displaying the amount of initial feedback was one of the features of the panel.

title: Patient Document Management
description: Patient Document Management software was used to archive and manage medical records, including doctor visits, medications, radiology images, and patient records. Using this program reduced the volume of paper in the hospital and made it easier for doctors to access patient records.

title: Chaartaar
subTitle: (Music Band)
description: Chaartaar is a Persian fusion of electronic music combined with Persian vocal music.
